UTILS submodule¶

utils.determine_logging_level()[source]¶

Internal. Used to determine loggging level.

utils.determine_properties_of_disk(image)[source]¶

Internal function which determines the position of the center of the disk as well as its radius.

utils.determine_properties_of_rect(mask_of_rect_alone)[source]¶

Determines center of rectangular region, useful for FTP analysis.

utils.generate_average_image(dset)[source]¶

Generate average of images (typically for gray and reference ones). Input is a pointer to a dataset in the HDF5 file.

utils.generate_mask(image)[source]¶

Generate a mask from a gray image. This mask contains both the disk and the rectangle, and its so conceived as to be gerchberg-completed afterwards.

utils.view_disk_mask(image)[source]¶

Visualize disk mask from a gray image as generated by generate_mask.
